title: 禁止玩家的back和获得权限
author: zyw5

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
mangaddp builder -essentials.back可禁止back权限
获得权限是什么...

replies.author: zyw5
replies.txt_content:
SS菜鸟君 发表于 2016-1-9 19:01
mangaddp builder -essentials.back可禁止back权限
获得权限是什么...
也是back

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
zyw5 发表于 2016-1-9 19:06
也是back
那就输入上面的指令就可以
还有你签名档最好改掉

replies.author: NLI丨眼泪
replies.txt_content: 权限是essentials.back 禁止是前面加个-

replies.author: Air_light_wyw
replies.txt_content:
建议使用：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... p;highlight=Permiss
这个权限管理插件。
输入指令：/pex group default remove essentials.back即可！
求悬赏QWQ{:10_492:}
